metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5421 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
A malicious site could spoof the contents of the print preview window if popup windows are enabled, resulting in user confusion of what site is currently loaded. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52 and Thunderbird < 52.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
